findings.title: CW-002 Incorrect Access Control
findings.description: Additional checks for critical logic and flow

findings.title: CW-003 Payable Contract
findings.description: A function to withdraw ether should exist otherwise the ether will be trapped

findings.title: CW-004 Custom Modifier
findings.description: major recheck for custom modifier logic

findings.title: CW-005 Divide Before Multiply
findings.description: Performing multiplication before division is generally better to avoid loss of precision

findings.title: CW-007 Deprecated Keywords
findings.description: Use of deprecated functions/operators should be avoided

findings.title: CW-008 Unused Contract
findings.description: Presence of an unused, unimported or uncalled contract

findings.title: CW-009 Assembly Usage
findings.description: Use of EVM assembly is error-prone and should be avoided

findings.title: CW-010 Similar Variable Names
findings.description: Variables with similar names could be confused for each other

findings.title: CW-012 SafeMath Override
findings.description: SafeMath is no longer needed starting with Solidity v0.8+
